definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax

sentences.english: In addition to reducing rent and interest rates, the government has made the payment of them mandatory.
sentences.chinese: 而在减租减息之外，政府还规定必须交租交息。

sentences.english: Wherever this work has not been thorough, it must be done thoroughly this year.
sentences.chinese: 减而不彻底的，必须于今年彻底减租。

sentences.english: The cruel landlord would bate him no rent.
sentences.chinese: 那个狠心的地主不肯给他减租。

sentences.english: We also incited the masses to struggle for rent and interest rates reductions.
sentences.chinese: 就是在减租减息发动群众上，我们也做了一些工作。

sentences.english: Therefore, we have made a specific stipulation that rent reduction be conducted.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们特别作了规定，实行减租。

sentences.english: Very often they buried alive men who had engaged in the struggle for reduction of rents.
sentences.chinese: 他们经常是把那些参加过减租斗争的人活埋。

definition: "land to the tiller", post-Liberation land reform movement instigated by the CCP
taxation/in former times, esp. land tax
to let sb off (punishment, taxation etc)/to reprieve sb
land reform/same as 土地改革[tu3 di4 gai3 ge2]
to rent out one's land (to tenant farmers)
to refuse to pay taxes/to boycott a levy
